content: this legal document is about a divorce case between mr a and mrs b they have decided to proceed with a divorce by mutual consent and have made agreements regarding the settlement of their rights they discussed the details of their marriage including the absence of a marriage contract and the amendments they made through a notary deed they also agreed on the division of their property including movable and immovable assets and mentioned that they have two minor children the document outlines the settlement of mutual rights between mr and mrs bb including the division of movable property financial assets and a car it also discusses the ownership and joint ownership of real estate properties the responsibilities and costs associated with them and the options for the end of joint ownership the document addresses the ownership and enjoyment of another real estate property inheritances gifts and bequests as well as the parties responsibilities for their own wages income and debts it also involves a mortgage claim and a credit opening between the parties as well as agreements related to the exercise of parental authority over the minor children the document concludes with the parties waiving spousal maintenance and confirming their understanding of the costs and obligations involved
